content: I'm not sure I can be much more specific than to say that the way it looks to us sitting and looking at our pipeline of announced deals and deals that are, kind of behind the scenes and nearing announcement and so on, that it looks very much like the last three years and you've got to look at those three years and those three years when had pretty weak performance in the first half really quite substantial performance and profitability in the second half and netted out to a good place all three of those years.
